# `to yaml` for [formats](/commands/categories/formats.md)

<div class='command-title'>Convert table into .yaml&#x2f;.yml text.</div>

## Signature

```> to yaml {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input | output |
| ----- | ------ |
| any   | string |

## Examples

Outputs an YAML string representing the contents of this table
```nu
> [[foo bar]; ["1" "2"]] | to yaml
- foo: '1'
  bar: '2'

```
